item.description:
**************************
The food cost should be $31 which includes tax and tip (still waiting confirmation from the chef).
The wine cost is between $22-25/person.

The food cost will be paid to Chloes via cash or credit card.
The wine cost will be paid to me in cash.
Please bring $20 plus five $1 bills.
**************************
This years March meeting will be at Chloe's restaurant in Hudson, MA
Chloe Bistro

We will pair Chloe's gourmet food with CA and Oregon Pinots Noirs, that we will provide.

The menu/style will be similar to last years.
o Gather before dinner with a Greeting wine
o Two appetizers on 1 plate with two different Pinots
o Main Entree (Chef will provide pairing ideas with a Pinot)
o Cheese platter from VinBin
o Maybe a dessert wine depending on costs

We're trying to keep the cost the same as last year. About $31/person (includes tax/tip) for food and $20-$25/person for the wine.

Since the meeting is a Tuesday night, we can use the Dining Room which is larger than the bar area. So currently there's a higher attendee limit of about 30. Please RSVP if you'll be attending and are bringing a guest. Preference will be given to current active members first, if the limit is approached. A Maybe RSVP will be allowed, but of course must be changed to Yes or No, as we approach March 16th.

Also, please answer the two dinner polling questions.
http://www.meetup.com...

Please email me with any questions/concerns.
Mike
item.name: AWS March Meeting at Chloe's Restaurant
